subject: Example text using QS keyboard mapping proposals
msgSnippet: Following the example of omniglot.com, I ve transcribed Article 1 of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights using each of the proposed QS keyboard mappings.
messageBody:
Following the example of omniglot.com, I've transcribed Article 1 of
the Universal Declaration of Human Rights using each of the proposed
QS keyboard mappings. Question marks appear where assignments haven't
been made yet or are made to problematic characters. (Some of you may
notice that my QS spellings below are not quite the same as shown on
the QS page at omniglot.com.)

I've written a perl script to do this, so I'll create a few more
examples and post them soon. If you'd like to use this script
yourself, it's here:
http://staff.washington.edu/freeman/qs/qs_map_permute.pl.txt

Text of Article 1:
All human beings are born free and equal in dignity and rights. They
are endowed with reason and conscience and should act towards one
another in a spirit of brotherhood.

In QS, using each keyboard proposal:

Jerome kbd:
{Yl hjMman bIiNz yr bYrn frI n Ikwul iG dignitI n rFts.
HE yr eGdQd wiT rIzan n kynSans n SUd Akt tawYrdz wan
anaHar iG a spirat v braHarhUd.}

QS-SAMPA:
{Ol hjumyn biINz Ar bOrn fri n ikwVl Iq dIgnIti n rYts.
De Ar EqdHd wIT rizyn n kAnSyns n SUd akt tywOrdz wyn
ynyDyr Iq y spIryt v bryDyrhUd.}

Paul Tremblay:
{Ol hyuman bYiNz Ar bOrn frY n Ykw?l i? dignitY n rIts.
DE Ar e?dHd wiT rYzan n kAnSans n SUd Jkt tawOrdz wan
anaDar i? a spirat v braDarhUd.}

Peter Guinness:
{Ql hyUmun bEiNz Rr bQrn frE n EkwGl iM dignitE n rIts.
DA Rr eMdWd wiT rEzun n kRnSuns n SVd akt tuwQrdz wun
unuDur iM u spirut v bruDurhVd.}

BPJ1:
{Ql hjUmyn bIiGz qr bQrn frI n IkwVl iN dignitI n rAts.
DE qr eNdYd wiT rIzyn n kqnSyns n Sud akt tywQrdz wyn
ynyDyr iN y spiryt v bryDyrhud.}

BPJ2:
{Ql hyUmun bIiGz Ar bQrn frI n IkwCl iN dignitI n rYts.
DE Ar eNdBd wiT rIzun n kAnSuns n SVd akt tuwQrdz wun
unuDur iN u spirut v bruDurhVd.}

QS-Up:
{Yl hjUman bIiNz yr bYrn frI n Ikwul iM dignitI n rFts.
DE yr eMdQd wiT rIzan n kynSans n SVd Akt tawYrdz wan
anaDar iM a spirat v braDarhVd.}

QS-Nu:
{ql hYUmun bEiGz yr bqrn frE n Ekwcl iN dignitE n rIts.
DA yr eNdPd wiT rEzun n kynSuns n Svd akt tuwqrdz wun
unuDur iN u spirut V bruDurhvd.}

Moira:
{yl hYCmun bEiNz Pr byrn frE n EkwUl iM dignitE n rIts.
DA Pr eMdQd wiT rEzun n kPnSuns n SVd akt tuwyrdz wun
unuDur iM u spirut v bruDurhVd.}



Ted
